Activity: Review emails and prioritize urgent requests. Catch up on industry blogs.
Send reminder email to all clinical staff about the importance of EHR documentation and the upcoming influenza season. Include links to relevant resources and training materials.
Analyze the final results of the nurse survey. Identify trends and areas for improvement. Write a summary report and send it to the relevant stakeholders.
Meet with the EHR Vendor Liaison @ehrv-1 to discuss the status of outstanding issues and prioritize resolution. Set clear expectations for response times and service level agreements.
Review the data quality reports generated by the Data Analysts @da-1, @da-2 and identify any patterns or trends. Investigate potential causes and implement corrective actions.
Prepare a summary of the week's activities and accomplishments. Highlight key achievements, challenges, and lessons learned. Share the summary with senior management and the project team.
Plan for next week's activities. Identify key priorities and schedule meetings. Delegate tasks as necessary.
Review the project budget and track expenses. Ensure that the project is on track to meet its financial goals. Communicate any concerns to the IT Project Manager @itpm-1.
Final check of emails. Organize files and documents. Prepare for the weekend.
